div.p: Welcome to American International School of Jeddah's Online Application. We have designed our online application process to make applying as simple as possible.
Please complete the Online Application forms listed on the top, beginning with the Student Information form.

Feedback will be provided throughout the process to help you complete the application. You need to complete all questions required in order to move to the next form. After you have completed the application, a Submit Application form will appear on the bottom of the page. Please follow the instructions that will be provided to submit the application.
Please click 'Save' after completing each section of the application so you do not lose your progress.

In order to complete the application process, please complete the checklist items listed below, including submission of all supplemental application forms.
Submit completed Online Application.
Submit the following by uploading documents in the “Document Upload” area located towards the end of this process:
A copy of Immunization History
A copy of the Student’s Passport
A copy of the Guardian’s Passport
A copy of the Student’s Iqama
A copy of the Guardian’s Iqama
Previous two (2) year’s final report card and current year-to-date report card (in English)
Previous School’s Official Transcript
Previous school’s profile with explanation of grading scale
Standardized Test Records
Copy of Family ID (If Saudi)
Attendance Report
Guardian's Business Card (if applicable)
Confidential English Recommendation letter to be completed by current English Teacher. To be forwarded directly from school to our Admissions Office.
Confidential Math Recommendation letter to be completed by current Math Teacher. To be forwarded directly from school to our Admissions Office.

Admissions assessment is required for all applicants who are accepted. Placement decisions are made by the Admissions Committee and based upon the results of the assessment and review of submitted records.
After receiving acceptance notification, parents will be provided information necessary to complete the admissions process.
We appreciate your interest and look forward to meeting you. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at +966122328668 Ext. 128 or 129.

t.p: Photos and videos of students or their work may be featured in materials to increase awareness of AISJ, engage the community, and/or recruit and train staff. This is done through print ads, online (AISJ website/official social media outlets/other), displays, brochures, banners, flyers, posters, and other types of media. Please note that a student's participation in any event/concert/production or other activity, that is publicized by AISJ, AUTOMATICALLY GRANTS AISJ permission to use that student's picture in all publicized material (social media, website, videos, ads...) for that particular event/activity.

p.strong: It is the belief of AISJ that the success of our students can only take place when there is a positive partnership between parents and the school. To ensure parents fully understand what is expected of them, they are asked to affirm their willingness to be part of this partnership by adhering to the points listed below.

b.i: Our mission is to inspire and facilitate learners through an authentic American education in order to nurture their passion for knowledge, so they may pursue their dreams and become successful global citizens.
